text: Joe Pytka (born November 4, 1938) is an American movie and music video director. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He holds the record for the most nominations for the Directors Guild of America Award for Outstanding Directing â€“ Commercials. He directed many music videos of Michael Jackson and directed Space Jam. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Pittsburgh
title: Joe Pytka
